articles.description: The galaxy is yours in LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga! Experience memorable moments and nonstop action from all nine Skywalker saga films retold with signature LEGO humour. Out tomorrow on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4 & Nintendo Switch. To celebrat…
